attributes.action: add an "I xxx, sign up against this petition"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petitions that are highly visible and controversial can be a bit like a steam roller and gather lots of signatures, while the actual opposition to a petition may be less visible.

This will make it easier to find the correct petition to oppose because the text would be the same. If two different petitions were created, it would be harder to find both and the text of each will be different.

I would like to show a balanced view in the easiest way possible by having all petitions created with for and against signature boxes.

rejection.details: Many thanks for this feedback. We will consider this very seriously while we review how this beta testing phase has worked. Your thoughts are very welcome.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
